pli-tv-pvr2.11:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.1: (5) When it comes to the offenses that are a result of consenting to physical contact, to how many of the four kinds of failure do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.2: They belong to two kinds of failure:
pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.3: they may be failure in morality; they may be failure in conduct. …
pli-tv-pvr2.11:2.1: (8) When it comes to the offenses that are a result of asking for curd and then eating it, to how many of the four kinds of failure do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.11:3.1: Concluded is the Third Chapter: on Falling Away
